name: Ziina
headline: A digital wallet for the Middle East & North Africa
description: Ziina is bringing the next generation of financial services to the Middle East.

founders.name: Sarah Toukan, Founder
founders.description:
Sarah Toukan is the Chief Product Officer and Co-Founder of Ziina. She has product and startup experience across several diverse and exciting spaces, including the fintech space in the UAE, the proptech space in London, and the autonomous vehicle space in Silicon Valley. 

Sarah graduated from Stanford with a Bachelor’s and Master's Degree in Mechanical Engineering, with a Product Development concentration.

founders.name: Andrew Gold, Founder
founders.description: Andrew began his career as an engineer on the iOS Safari team at Apple. He left Apple to join an early stage startup, Distributed Systems, which was later acquired by Coinbase. At Coinbase, Andrew helped build the Coinbase Wallet app, a product which enables users all over the world to store their own crypto and access the decentralized web. Inspired by the mission of expanding economic freedom, Andrew relocated from San Francisco to Dubai to found Ziina.

founders.name: Faisal Toukan, Founder
founders.description: Faisal Toukan is the CEO and Co-Founder of Ziina. He has experience across consumer fintech, enterprise sales, blockchain, start-ups, and venture capital with a passion for bringing new technologies to market.

# Move your money forward
For businesses and individuals – the fast and secure way to send and receive money in the UAE
[Get started for free](https://www.ziina.com/</app-link/DownloadApp>)
[![UAE central bank license](https://www.ziina.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwebsite-kxaz7ljvk-ziina.vercel.app%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fuae-central-bank-logo.b85c69e4.webp&w=256&q=75)Licensed by the Central Bank of the UAE](https://www.ziina.com/<https:/www.centralbank.ae/en/licensing/>)
Whether you’re building your business or splitting the bill with friends, Ziina helps move your money forward. We’re on a mission to bring financial freedom to every person in the Middle East. Because access isn’t a privilege — it’s a right.
[![image for link](https://www.ziina.com)BusinessGet paid instantlyZiina Business](https://www.ziina.com/</business>)
[![image for link](https://www.ziina.com)PersonalPay your friendsZiina Personal](https://www.ziina.com/</personal>)

generated_description:
### Overview of Ziina

*Ziina* is a modern fintech startup, founded in 2020, focused on transforming how individuals and businesses in the Middle East manage their finances. It's essentially a digital wallet designed to address the unique payment needs of the region, specifically tapping into markets in the United Arab Emirates and across the broader Middle East and North Africa. This innovative platform allows users to send and receive money seamlessly and securely, enabling both personal and business transactions with a few taps on their mobile devices.

### Mission and Vision

Ziina’s mission is clear: **"Move your money forward."** The company believes that financial access is a fundamental right, not a privilege. Their ambition is about providing financial freedom to every individual in the area, simplifying transactions, and promoting inclusive financial services.

### Key Details

- **Founded:** 2020
- **Location:** United Arab Emirates
- **Team Size:** 25 employees
- **Y Combinator Batch:** W21
- **Website:** [ziina.com](https://www.ziina.com)
- **Group Partner:** Dalton Caldwell
- **Industry Tags:** Fintech, Payments, Neobank

### Current Offerings

Ziina has a suite of services catering to various needs:
- **Personal Wallet:** For easy peer-to-peer money transfers. 
- **Business Solutions:** Designed to help small businesses manage payments and cash flow efficiently.
- **Payment Gateway:** Provides a streamlined way for businesses to accept payments online.

### Recent Achievements

The company is making significant strides in the fintech space:
1. **Regulatory Approval:** Ziina has secured a *Stored Value Facility License* from the Central Bank of the UAE, highlighting its commitment to compliance and regulatory standards.
2. **Funding Success:** Recent Series A funding round secured $22 million, aimed at expanding its product offerings beyond just payments into comprehensive financial services.
3. **Real-world Impact:** The platform has helped businesses like *Eat & Slim* and *The Expat Group* enhance their operational efficiency by minimizing payment delays and simplifying cash flow management.

### Future Aspirations

With its recent funding, Ziina aims to transition from a payment-centric platform to a full-fledged financial services provider. The startup is poised for rapid growth, riding the wave of digital transformation in the financial sector throughout the Middle East.

In conclusion, Ziina is not just another fintech; it's on a mission to redefine financial accessibility and efficiency in the MENA region. Whether you're splitting a bill or managing a business, Ziina is positioning itself as a trustworthy partner for forward-thinking financial solutions.
